message: I've got a top-of-the-line product for you! This one's a real showstopper, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a steal at $100, considering its premium quality. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'm not sure about the quality, I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a rare gem. It's one of the best I've got, and I'm willing to make a special offer just for you. I'll throw in a premium warranty and dedicated support for the next 6 months. It's a $100 value, absolutely free! What do you say? Will you give it a chance?
I'm still not convinced, I'll pass again.
